backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor module with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping fireworksâ€‘related requirements to the FireworksOverlay component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each main frontend component and config file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining the light/dark Valentine-themed palette.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling Valentine interaction flow, YES celebration state, and fireworks timing.
frontend/src/components/FireworksOverlay: Full-screen canvas rendering bright fireworks with configurable intensity, mobile scaling, and complete cleanup.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Canvas animation of drifting, rising hearts forming a decorative background.
frontend/src/components/MovingNoButton.t: Interactive NO button that jumps to random safe positions and cycles humorous messages on interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive custom Valentine-themed color variables with utility classes and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors with CSS variables, adding plugins, animations, and Valentine color mappings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, versions, and overall scaffold state for an ICP app.
